articles.description: Four new cases are connected to known outbreaks and 26 are from routine testing. The state government has completed about 40,000 tests for the two days of their three-day suburban blitz.
articles.content: The Commonwealth strongly endorses the testing of all people in hotel quarantine. The Commonwealth supports the widespread testing under way in Victoria, especially in the areas of highest prevalence… [+1739 chars]
